name: The Adventure of Ratgellan
description:
Developed in Pico 8 for Endless Gamejam.

In The Adventure of Ratgellan you take control of the famous rat explorer Ratgellan. Help him recover all the Pirat booty that you can see. Be warned the sewers never seem to run out of booty.

Controls:

Left arrow: Move left

Right arrow: Move right

X: interact with buttons

Z/O: Hold down to see how much booty you have found. While viewing this menu press X to restart to menu screen. 

Second full game ever made and for second gamejam. Collision still has some issues, but adds a little to the experience. Enjoy.

Theme was decay. What better place than in a sewer.
